ygData.subject: Re: Broken Spells and Quests [Quest Info]
ygData.msgSnippet: you give the letter to the guy rambling about drosco, and he will give you some silver, a random item , and a faction
ygData.messageBody:
you give the letter to the guy rambling about drosco, and he will give you
some silver, a random item <bags, spells below level 4, daggers>, and a
faction increase for the necros, and decrease for the townies above. you
take the medallion of thunder to the priestess in the hall of the order of
thunder in the town above to get some xp and a faction increase for the town
and merchants, with a slight decrease to the necro guild. all in all, it
kinda balances out to keep killing drosco and doing the quest, if you don't
mind the walk that is.

Cyrissa, level 7 necro Veeshan
